title: Aussie apricot chicken
ingredients: ['1 tin apricot halves in light syrup', '2 sachets French onion soup - cup a soup', '60ml dry sherry or white wine', '4 chicken breast fillets, cut into chunks', 'plain flour', 'salt and pepper', 'oil', '2 large onions, sliced', '1/2 tablespoon soy sauce', 'good splash orange juice', '60ml water']
